title: Update an Employee Record in HRIS
description: An HR admin needs to update an employee's job title in the HRIS following a promotion.

tasks.description: Identify the employee in the HRIS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin successfully locates the correct employee record.

tasks.description: Update the 'Job Title' field from 'Analyst' to 'Senior Analyst'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin correctly changes the job title.

tasks.description: Save the changes and verify that the new title is reflected in the employee's profile.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin saves the record and confirms the update was successful.
